title: Language Education Storytelling Design Utilizing Filmmaking Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience in educational content development
context.additional_context: Emphasizes Smartphone-Based Participation, Real-Time Interaction, and Collaborative Learning

learning_goals: Learners can enhance their ability to design language learning scenarios using the three-act structure of film production
Learners can create language learning motivation content by applying character arc techniques
Learners can develop language education modules using visual storytelling tools (smartphone filming/editing)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
